e1a3bb45-416e-42d4-af76-5dd320cdabba.description: The earner of this NWFA certification is recognized for possessing industry knowledge and expertise related to wood flooring sales. badge_template_activities.title:
This individual is an NWFA member in good standing who has submitted a wood flooring portfolio for review and approval. This portfolio contains a minimum of five individual submissions from five separate wood bending wood flooring applications. Requirements include:Each project must exhibit unique characteristics from the other submissions.
The bending of the wood should be noticeable and should add a curved element to the flooring design.
